Title:
Predicting Risk of Pre-Release Code Changes with
CheckinMentor
Improved_SZZ: Yes ('we use our modification of the SZZ algorithm')
Elements_risk_assessment:
the fix for the bug affects the same area of the
code (function, line) of the system
Summary:
They describe code changes with metrics and then use a statistical
model that discriminates between faulty and non-faulty changes.
Outcome: The model has shown high accuracy
